content.detailedDescription:
I was on holiday in sunny beach bulgaria when i decided to take some nightime photos and i just happened to look up in the sky and saw a starnge light in the sky ssw from me moving east very slowley i tried to take a photo of the object but my battery died on it i continued to observe it for about 10 mins and then it just vanished i turned and walked back about 50 meters and looked behind me and noticed it again but it was in its original position from when i first saw it i watched for a further 7 mins and then it vanished again i waited for about 20 mins to see if it would reappear but nothing 

during my holiday i had seen chinese lanterns being set off but this looked nothing like one of those 

this is a experiance that will stay with me for the rest of my life even though whoever i have told this to think i am crazy i know what i saw and i stand by that
content.summary: Ufo spotted whilst on holiday which was a glowing light

content.detailedDescription: Me and 2 of my closest friends went for a night drive in my pickup truck at the base of the mountain. we were laying in the bed of the truck, i was showing them stars in the sky. i noticed that there was a very large glowing light above the mountain. it began to move very fast changing direction every second. then 2 helicopters appeared behind it. at that point it flashed 2 times and sped of at the speed of light. leaving a light trail behind it. me and my friends were very scared and left. (about 1 hour before we saw the object there was a large flash of light that came from behind the mountain. we thought it might be lightning or something but now i think it was somehow related to the ufo event) i tried to take a video but it was to dark outside.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Large glowing object hovering above ben lomond peak, ogden ut

content.detailedDescription: Oline stoper ufo over sightings report thant  you ufo bat er you sightings report flyings report ter
content.shape: Chevron,   Circle,   Diamond,   Egg,   Flash,   Saturn-like,   Other
content.summary: Gflyings serter

content.detailedDescription: It was 2:16 sunday afternoon, 9/29/2013 i had just gone outside on our ground floor back yard patio for a smoke.  i was looking up and out to check the sky because the weather people had said we were due for rain.  i then noticed a large white cloud and did a double take as i saw something move on top of the cloud.  as i looked again i observed a dull yellow cigar shaped object with small black markings in the distance over the cloud.  as i turned to watch it it had been in a forward motion. at the point i looked it stopped abruptly and slowly, like a leaf, began to drop into the cloud.  i continued to observe the cloud but saw no more of the object.  i saw it long enough to know that it was neither an aircraft nor a blimp because what i saw did movements like nothing i've ever seen.  no wings or gondola.  my afterthought was "i can't believe it" however when i began to tell members of my family they thought i was coo-coo or i was pulling their leg.  i know what i saw.
content.summary: Looking at clouds and saw cigar shaped ship arrive, then dead stop and soft descent.

content.detailedDescription: We live on a hill that is higher than street level, outside our house at 6:00 pm, and noticed bright light in the southwest sky. it caught my attention because of its brightness. at  first i thought it was an airplane, as we live in flight paths of navy jets, and in and out going planes from san diego international airport, but it was too bright. upon further observing it, i noticed that it wasn't moving in any direction, but  was stationary. i went to get binoculars, phone, and my son. object was still in same place. we bot h observed it through the binoculars, and agreed there was an oval shape that was slightly wider on one end, with a gap, between object, and the tail, or larger end.  see pics and vid.  my wife observed it at this point with binoculars, and agreed it was brighter than any star, was not moving, and was definitely not an airplane. we decided to drive down our hill to the bottom at street level, and could see the object in the sky, stationary , brighter than anything in the sky, and observed it with binoculars for 40 min. it began to get dark, and the object was aspirin size in the sky, brighter than any star that began to appear. not being able to see any defined shape, we figured it was very large and very far away, as the shape was not definite as an airplane would be through the same binoculars. i had to field a phone call and when i came out the object was gone. i took a hd video which somewhat shows a shape, a a couple vids to show it was stationary. it was definitely unidentified.
content.summary: Stationary bright light observed in one spot for 45 minutes

content.detailedDescription: 1 park on road waiting to get in to drivein movie  2 the orange and yellow and coloer ,3.  did not know 4.It just slowy move around and came over the top of the move screen about 15 feet and just hoverd for about 5 minnits poeple were going nuts about 80or 100 people saw it and they were scared to death. 5.Scared. 6.It just slowly backed up .It stayed around for about an hour +.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looked like cone with lights around the bottom side of it

content.detailedDescription: While a night of astro-photography in mountain ranch with my friend we observed what first looked to be stars in the sky above the mountain tree line in the north east. but being familiar with constellations i knew these were not stars. when then observed them moving towards us. they appeared as 2 lights in formation which could have been 2 miles apart from each other. but the moving lights were synchronized as if a single object with a solid white light on each end but no visible structure in the middle. the object then descended below the mountain line and dissapeared.
content.summary: While taking astro-photos observed 2 lights in formation moving together as if one object.

content.detailedDescription: My husband was driving us home and i was in the back and i noticed 5-6 bright orange orbs over the new york city skyline.  it wasn't hard to miss because they were bigger than the stars.  we also saw planes around the same area where the orange orbs appeared and there was a difference with the lights.  my husband then pulled over into the driveway and we stared at the sky and noticed the orange orbs slowly changing position and some orbs disappearing and reappearing.  my husband grabbed our camera took a picture and the orange orbs slowly disappeared.
content.summary: 5-8 bright orange orb lights over new york city skyline

content.detailedDescription: On friday night at 10:05pm my wife and i were watching tv when i noticed a strange looking flying object with multiple lights. it looked like a cigar with four or five lights. the back light was yellowish gold, then there was a red blinking light, the next light was dark blue and the front light was solid red. it was flying much faster then any plane we have ever seen. it covered the with of the sky in about 5 seconds maybe a couple more but it was very fast. my wife and i were only standing at the back door watching it for less then 10 seconds. when it was gone, mary and i were left feeling we saw something that we have never seen before. we talked about it for a few minutes, we found this on the internet search, i hope this helps figure out what we saw, if you able to let us know something we would be thankful.
content.summary: Cigar shaped object flying south to north very fast no sound, it had multi colored lights

content.detailedDescription:
while visiting our families vacation cabins in keithsburg, il, a small town some 50 miles away from davenport, iowa, my brother, cousin, and their 2 friends witnessed a "ufo sighting" over the port luisa wildlife refuge.  we had witnessed the unidentifiable object early in the morning while standing on our deck that overlooks the lake and a large part of the refuge.  it appeared quite obviously to us, looking similarly to a ball of light changing shape and size, direction, color, and appearing and disappearing in wildly frequent scattered patterns.  it sounded like helicopter blades chopping at the air but gave no visual or even slight other hint that it behaved as a helicopter would let alone anything else commonly seen in today's skies.  
as you will notice in the video, the object does not move or act as any object, flying or not, would in today's world.  it seems to move erratically through the sky and mostly materialize from one spot in the sky to another in an instant.  if you slow the video down, you can even see the apparent light from the ufo changing shapes and moving in a spiral motion often changing the direction of the spiral as it appears from one spot to another.
while watching, it was very apparent from the start that this was something that was out of the ordinary which was what first lead our attention to it.  we all just kept trying to explain to ourselves what it was.  it was very exciting and yet mysterious.  we knew we were seeing and experiencing something truly rare and out of the ordinary.  eventually, (not included in the video), we stopped filming and just gazed in wonder as it didn't appear to be catching anything on the phones we were recording on.  the object appeared much greater in size, shape, detail, and various colors than it appears on the video taken from a cell phone (the only way we could document at the given moment).  it kept getting closer and closer and it worried us all a bit.  we chose to go inside but once we started walking to go back inside it seemed to get closer and closer.  we were all shaken up by this and chose to stay inside and not document or view this object any further due to it's mysterious nature and our questions of its intent was and if it had known that it was being observed by us.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Pulsating ufo w/ impossible maneuvers, directinal change, materializing & flying over port luisa, keithsburg, illinois

content.detailedDescription:
I walked out to smoke a cigarette and immediately was drawn to (what resembled a fireball) a brightly lit object approaching from the ne.  at first glance, i assumed it was a helicopter shuffling the folks back to manhattan from the hamptons, which is common on the north coast of long island.

there were several aircraft in the sky at different altitudes, but my attention remained on the object because of the glow and the fact it was not making noise.  it did not have flashes, blinking or anything and i assumed i was catching a glimpse of the first meteor i had ever seen, and than it stopped for several seconds...

i couldn't believe it stopped, and was even more amazed when it either reduced in size or simply had turned to what appeared to be due north.  it took a trajectory of what appeared to be directly at an airplane flying south.  when the paths of the plane and the object crossed - it was the first time i realized that the object was already at a much higher altitude and that the object was moving at a speed that left me stunned.  i mean...Literally stunned!  it was a crystal clear night, i have excellent vision, and in my 45 years i have never seen anything i could not explain.  

originally, i thought the object flew out of site to the north, but after seeing it cross visual path with the airplane i realized it was ascending and it continued in that straight direction until i could no longer see it by eye.  i went inside to tell my wife and even reported it to the local news station (seemed silly, but i had to know if others saw this.  i am a rationale guy, and i am not sure what it was that i saw - but i know it was there and i know i saw that fireball change direction.  i never felt afraid, just bewildered and a lot of second-guessing.  if anyone else saw it, or anybody can check if one of the planes saw it - please let me know.  i smoked a cigarette tonight a 9pm, no object to go along with a bad habit tonight.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object approached slowly of the li sound - stoppedn after 15 seconds - became smaller , less illuminated, turned direct north and vanished in 5 seconds

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dog at the dalton sand pits, when i witnessed an object over the tree ling just to my south/east.  looked like a hovering star "amber" at first.  i pointed my camcorder at object and recorded...   it slowly picked up speed, but was still very slow...  object continued on a heading of 290 and its altitude was under 2000 ft in my opinion..  and went directly over me..  i put the camera down and looked with my binoculars...   object was very strange...  it had several appendages that were in the shape of a x with a center structure.  four strobing lights, and center appendage looked like a multi-solar panel...

the whole occurance took about 4 minutes...   

the object flew to the west/north/wst over the mountains and out of site...  i stopped recording before that though...  was too hard to see well by then, and my arms could not do it any longer...


i have not downloaded my video yet....  i will need to send it to you later...

just let me know....
content.summary: Ufo object seen over tree line

content.detailedDescription: Light appeared became really bright and then disappeared. it was before stars came out and it was stationary the whole time. there was a jet in the area so i am ruling out atmospheric distortion as the reason for disappearing. more info on the other report that was submitted on sept 23 2013 in surprise az.
content.summary: Just saw the same event i reported on the 23rd - light appears then disappears

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were on our evening walk in our neighborhood. on our final leg of our walk in our development we saw this bright glowing light through he trees. as the trees cleared we could see clearly this oval shaped orb that appeared to be glowing red/orange/yellow, slightly fuzzy and flame like around the edges. it was high in the sky, below the cloud cover and as its direction was coming towards us it  looked like it was descending then slowly rose and continued is gentle, slow, floating flight pattern from the north to the south east as it disappeared from view, all without any noise. we had no idea what it was and would really like to know if anyone else saw this.
content.summary: Floating glowing flame-like orb that crossed the night sky.

content.detailedDescription: My wife called me on balcony of our 11th floor hotel room. we both witnessed an orange almost round object coming towards us. as it got maybe 50 feet away, it went slowly out over the ocean and disappeared. we saw another, what i believed was a helicopter over a pier, and it almost stopped and put on a light to scan the ocean. it hovered, for awhile and then went over the hotel at the end of myrtle beach and then picked up speed and we lost sight as it was getting close in distance and height to the hotel about 3 mins away. the first i thought was a toy plane until it disappeared over the ocean. the second appeared to be a helicopter looking for something in the water but was silent and was far too close to the buildings. i watched people on the beach to see reactions because the pier lights and hotel lights lit up the area, but they seemed uninterested so it must have been a toy or something that was explained. i videoed but it did not pick it up well.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: One was orange and almost round and came towards us. other like small plane

content.detailedDescription: Early on the morning of the 27/8/2013 3:30am i went out onto my 2nd story flat kitchen roof to relax and watch the sky as i very often do to look at the constellations sometimes the odd bit of stardust and passing satellites. just before the sighting i was observing the hunter in the south-east as i turned my head to find another constellation a pea green flash caught my eye in the south west.I locked on to it as i did it was pulsating from pea green to a dirty white then more of a burnt orange rather than a copper then to a dull gold more like brass in colour. when i first seen it,it was static then started to move slowly then stopped again after maybe 30seconds. a short beam of light omitted from the object, but this beam did not touch the ground then the object moved very quick and came to a stop almost as quick. distance traveled unknown as no reference points. then the object droped about 30degrees,again the beam was seen then the object moved to the south-east still in plain sight,as amazing as all this was the next bit really made me think deep. what i seen next was really weird the object came to a stop still pulsating and just seemed to cloak and then nothing. many things went through my head as to what it was. this was no airplane no chopper no hot air balloon because they are not allowed to fly in the u.K. at night and no blimp. i watch the night sky on a regular basis and can explain away many,many things after the event i went back inside and sat down for maybe an hour thinking did i see what i seen!!! this is my first sighting and hope it wont be my last. this object was under intelligent control far beyond any technological capabilities that we have at this time.
content.summary: Bright object in the s/w not the usual.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside star gazing when i noticed a glowing yellow-orange sphere like object traveling at a high rate of speed from the ne to the sw. i originally thought it was a the iss. then realized it wasn't due to speed and color. i was naturally in awe because i had never seen anything like it. the object appeared to increase in color brightness and  altitude during its path sw, then disappeared into the black of night
content.summary: Glowing yellow/orange sphere

content.detailedDescription: My family and i observed multiple orange lights in the evening sky traveling from east from the southwest. i counted at least 16 of these bright orange lights/orbs high in the sky lined up like a conga line. looking directly south, they started at my 2:00 position and traveled to my 11:00 position within a 5-8 minute timeframe before dissipating once each of them reached a specific location.
content.summary: My family and i observed multiple orange lights in the evening sky.

content.detailedDescription: After ship passed over a jumbo jet that was about 20,000 feet high, i'm assuming this ship was at least 30,000 feet because airline stayed on same course. the ship was probably moving at least 5 to 10 times as fast. at that height it looked to be as long fore-finger to first knuckle and about 1/3 in width. as soon as it was out of my view to the ne i saw to ,either orbs or some other shapes, they were very bright either because it was very sunny and no clouds anywhere. the sun was to my left about the height of my head. as these two streaked across the sky from ne to sw it first looked like they were one in front of another. then the one in back went around the first looking like they were "playing" with each other. they did this a few times at very fast speeds. it only took them around 8 to 12 seconds until they were out of view. then approximately every 2 to 5 minutes i would see one on the same course from ne to sw totaling either 8 or 9 vehicles. i then got a severe headache from looking into a sunny, bright sky even with sunglasses. it was extremely strange but exciting.
content.summary: Very large rectangle shape, no noise fully lighted or extremely reflecting sun going ne.

content.detailedDescription:
At latitude: 41.678801, longitude: -93.6296, looking sw.To aproximately latitude: 41.59204, longitude: -93.804223 on sunday sept 29th at 
1245 pm two of us observed an object appearing similar to a large airplane, as it was cylindrical but shaped slightly at the nose and having a rear tail section very similar to what you see on pilot whales as they feed and/or show off for the camera. what was most striking was an appeared lack of wings and fact that at aprox 5-7 miles away was a minimum of 16" wide/long at arms length and was going right over top of what i'm sure was residential areas in and around wdm. i have seen the hercules up close and flew in c141 aircraft in the miltary and can say that this object was 5x larger than any c141 i've seen going to and from dsm intl. i called and spoke with the duty officer at dsm intl. i asked if they had just had a monster of an aircraft land at the ap, he indicated not to his knowledge and that he would know. after i explained what i saw and asked about their ever being the "super transport" at the ap, he indicated that they do occasionally get the hercules, in  the event "the president and company" come to town as they "carry in special vehicles etc... ." and that the air guard handles all those flights and is not required to share the info with the city ap. so, in the event we actually observed something like the c-17 globemaster at that distance the atmosheric conditions had to be perfect to translate into the size of craft we observed. i'm more than willing to accept the forgoing conclusion but the size of the thing seems to preclude the dsm intl ap from having adequate space for a landing. the craft had to have been (assuming our guess-timation on overland distance and height correct.) several hundred feet long (700-1000ft). i can't say for an absolute it wasn't some super transport but the two of us seem to think it was not!
content.summary: Two of us saw a incredibly large structure with a long cylindrical nose boy and a large tail similar to std airplane. the object appeared to have no wings and at an estimated 5-7 miles was a minimum of 16" at arms length!

content.detailedDescription: saw an orange colored orb ascend rather slowly. at first, i thought it was a firework. the orb appeared to travel rather slowly and silently. it moved across the sky in a straight line.
content.summary: Saw an orange colored orb ascend rather slowly.

content.detailedDescription: My wife was a passenger as my daughter was driving. in an open field on my wife's side,(north to northeast), my wife noticed 3 bright white lights in triangle formation, 100 yards from her hovering taller than tree top. she saw no visible object because it was dark. one by one the lights turned off and one by one the lights came back on. they did not blink or flash on and off like a typical aircraft. today, 9-29-2013, 1:30p.M. eastern time, my wife went back by the same area to pick up my daughter and told me there were no structures in the field. my wife was really awestruck while telling me what she saw.
content.summary: Driving by open field.

content.detailedDescription: Weird round-like cloud in the sky. almost perfect circle. disappeared after a while.
content.summary: Weird round-like cloud in the sky. almost perfect circle. disappeared after a while.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to put my sons toys away for the night, and noticed there was a lot of local airport traffic circling the area as the planes always do on  busy weekend as they wait for clearance to land. the planes were due east from my location. i started to turn to the southwest to see if saturn was still above the horizon(saturn was stunning to view with the naked eye a couple hours earlier). i looked up and almost directly overhead appr. 80deg from directly overhead i noticed a bright redish orange-yellow sphere stationary , hovering a little lower than the local air traffic observed in the sky simultaneously. i yelled to my dad through an open window, the orange fireball ufos are back.(we observed the same exact type of ufo, hovering in the same exact spot about the same distance from the ground. )he immediately ran outside. as we were both fumbling with our devices to get a picture or video the sphere silently ascended towards the southern skys above the commercial jets flying west. at this point the sphere began pulsating as it continued to ascend out of our atmosphere, until it slowly dimmed out like a satellite in the night sky. neptune was present in the approximate area of the sky where this object flew off to. june,7 of this year i experienced this same type of object displaying the same behaviors, the same hovering distance overhead, same spot in the sky, even ascended in the same exact part of the sky as previously. the only difference is the first sighting there were 5 spheres hovering overhead, then they slowly ascended the  same direction one by one. about a minute later, one by one 4 more vertically ascended from the treeline on the other side of the corn field in front of my house. once the first 3 were above the trees they went one by one horizontally right above the trees to about the same spot the first 5 were hovering. a final 4th one rose from the treeline as the 3 went horizontal to the "hovering spot". this last one started to come towards us unlike the others until it was about 150ft from us. it hovered overhead as the 3 ascended into the night sky one after the other, then this last one followed the others. i was able to get pictures of the 3flying horizontally above treeline. no luck with pictures for this second sighting. 
  i am feeling a lot of frustration at this point because nobody can tell me what it is i keep seeing in my yard, why i keep seeing them, and where "off" earth are they going?
content.distance: 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: bright orange-red fireball sphere hovered almost directly overhead almost 1\2min, then slowly ascended out of sight disapearing like satelites do

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i where taking a walk when we noticed the light. we thought it was the moon surrounded by what seem like a circle of misty clouds. we realised that it was not the moon and we ran home to fetch a camera. we could not take photos as it was too dark. i phoned a couple of friends who all saw it.The circle moved from ne to n at speed
content.summary: Bright starlike lite surrounded by circle of mist

content.detailedDescription:
I am a physician, surgeon and scientist. my wife and i were leaving the palace of asia indian restaurant at about 8 pm on 9/25/2013. when we exited the restaurant, we walked upon the parking lot and looking due south over the cooper river there were the ufos in plain sight in the center of the sky. there were at least two other couples in the parking lot, we all observed this together, everyone saw the same thing by our comments. 
in the center of the sighting there was a circle formation of distinct yellow-orange "orbs", about 8 to 10 in a circle just hovering, no sound at all. these orbs seemed to be glowing, there was another hue in them, smaller, maybe like a small dot of white and a small dot of red, but overall yellow-orange.
objects were entering and also leaving this circle. more would come from east to west in a line, traveling quite fast in an upward line at an angle of 45 degrees. these objects would join the circle, then to the right going from east to west objects would leave the circle and scatter off in the distance somewhat randomly, as they receded the objects got smaller, dimmer, then disappeared. 
a commercial jet flew right past this circle and these orbs were about half the size of the jet. if you held your arm out in an extended fashion a dime in your fingertips would obscure the object. can't estimate size because can't estimate distance from us.
when joining the circle the objects moved much faster than the jet. in the circle they hovered. their movement was unlike any man made object that can fly that i've ever seen - they didn't move like man made objects move. they moved fast and then stopped quickly, unusual.
surprisingly, none of the witnesses seem to be surprised or affected emotionally to any significant degree.
i called the collingswood police and reported it; they seemed to be over collingswood, but they could have been far away and not actually over collingswood.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Many (20 to 30) small yellow-orange round orbs came in an ascending linear pattern in formation from east to west then went in a circle patttern then went off in an eastern direction in a non linear patterm they

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were walking back home from kfc and it was almost 10:00 pm. we get helicopters that fly low it the area often but not this low.We noticed it flying overhead but it was quiet as a whisper! then i was like that's a plane see the wings but then i did a double take cause it turned around doing perfect 180 in mid flight! so then we were like a chopper?No.No sound but a slight buzzing sound humm. then in perfect formation one exactly behind the other at least three more just like it followed the first one we seen.Oh ya they had a blueish orange round lite on both wing tips which did not blink.Then we went inside to eat then google searched for any aircraft like that in the area but came up with nothing.
content.summary: Drone sized and shape aircraft with orange and blue mixed bright balls of light on both sides of wings.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home west bound on market street and noticed six or more lights hovering and changing colors. three of the lights ascended in tandem. they raised and lowered behind the tree tops from my view three or four times. i stopped my truck on the side of the road and watched them for approx. 2 minutes before i decided to video them with my cell phone. by that time there were only two left, but i did record them. they eventually faded away in the darkness
content.summary: 6 or more lights hovering flashing different colors ascending and decending in tandem

content.detailedDescription: Went outside at 8:03 pm to take a break from a poker game and saw an extremly large lighted object hovering at about 2,000 ft. the object appeared in the nw direction at that time it never moved just a big bright light. about 2 mins later a comercial plane flew under it. so u could see that the object was huge. no pulsesating lights just bright. my friend saw it aswell. i tried to take a picture of the object with my cell phone and my phone started to blink than shut off. im a professinal photographer i specialize in landscape photography. i also navigated my sailboat of the coast of mexico for a year traveling. i know the position of the stars and it was not a star. it was below the horizon and was to big and to close to my position to be a star.About 13 mins later i went outside to see it again a the object was gone.But the same stars that were there at the time of the sighting were still there.
content.summary: Huge bright lite about a quater the size of full moon 15 mins later it was gone

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
